parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The application group ID. You can obtain the application group ID on the Application Management page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace ID. You can obtain the namespace ID on the Namespace page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. This parameter is required only for a special third party.

parameters.name: TimeExpression
parameters.description:
The time expression. You can set the time expression based on the selected method that is used to specify time.

*   If you set TimeType to cron, you need to enter a standard cron expression. Online verification is supported.
*   If you set TimeType to api, no time expression is required.

parameters.name: TimeType
parameters.description:
The method that is used to specify the time. Valid values:

*   1: cron
*   100: api
